patthana22.14:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana22.14:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:2.1_1: Naakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:2.1_2: Naabyākataṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:2.1_3: Nakusalaṁ naaniyatañca naabyākataṁ naaniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:2.1_4: Naakusalaṁ naaniyatañca naabyākataṁ naaniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
